name: UIPointerInteraction
desc: An interaction that enables support for effects on a view or customizes the pointer's appearance within a region of an app.

items.name: init(delegate: UIPointerInteractionDelegate?)
items.desc: Initializes a pointer interaction object with a specified delegate object.

items.name: var delegate: UIPointerInteractionDelegate?
items.desc: An object that responds to pointer movements.

items.name: protocol UIPointerInteractionDelegate
items.desc: An interface for handling pointer movements within the interaction's view.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the pointer interaction is enabled.

items.name: func invalidate()
items.desc: Causes the interaction to update the pointer in response to an event.
